column4: USDA species code, or the first 2 letters of species scientific name
label for light treatment, "fs" represents for full sunlight treatment and "s" represents for 50% shade treatment
label for block: e.g. b4 is block 4
date when flammability experiment was done, also when the soil moisture content was measured
soil moisture content for each plant prior to flammability trial, in volumetric unit (%)
